Type.Name: TreeViewColumnSizing

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TreeViewColumnSizing extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: The sizing method the column uses to determine its width.
Docs.remarks: Please note that Autosize is inefficient for large views and can make columns appear choppy.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.TreeViewColumnSizing Autosize = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Columns resize to be the optimal size every time the model changes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.TreeViewColumnSizing Fixed = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Columns are a fixed numbers of pixels wide.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.TreeViewColumnSizing GrowOnly = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Columns only get bigger in reaction to changes in the model.
